scripts.sync-indexes: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); try{const dns=require('dns'); dns.setServers(['1.1.1.1','8.8.8.8']);}catch{} const mongoose=require('mongoose'); const MenuItem=require('./src/models/MenuItem'); const Order=require('./src/models/Order'); const User=require('./src/models/User'); (async()=>{for(let i=0;i<3;i++){try{await mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGO_URI,{useNewUrlParser:true,useUnifiedTopology:true}); break;}catch(e){if(i===2) throw e; await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,1000*(i+1)));}} await MenuItem.syncIndexes(); await Order.syncIndexes(); await User.syncIndexes(); console.log('Indexes synced'); process.exit(0)})().catch(e=>{console.error(e); process.exit(1)});"
